an5.257-263:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption …  third absorption …  fourth absorption …  or realize the fruit of stream entry … the fruit of once-return … the fruit of non-return … perfection.
an5.257-263:4.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.257-263:4.4: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t realize perfection.
an5.257-263:5.1: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the second absorption …  third absorption …  fourth absorption …  and realize the fruit of stream entry … the fruit of once-return … the fruit of non-return … perfection.
an5.257-263:5.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.257-263:5.4: After giving up these five qualities you can realize perfection.”
